name: MT1
description: The receipt of a new requirement to new contract award based upon competition or Sole Source Request for Proposal
:LABEL: MissionThread

name: MT2
description: The receipt of a new requirement to new contract award based upon competition or Sole Source Request for Proposal; The solicitation or RFP has one or more amendments due to changes in requirements after solicitation or RFP Issuance.
:LABEL: MissionThread

name: MT3
description: The receipt of a new requirement to an order being placed via an existing single source Indefinite-Delivery contract

name: MT4
description: The receipt of a new & in scope requirement to contract modification award
:LABEL: MissionThread
